page.title: 08A Housewife's Life Burmarsh
page.content: Mrs X is a young housewife who lives with her farmer husband and two young children in their three bedroomed house - a barn, converted into a comfortable home seven years ago. Mrs X looks after her family and owns a Tea Room which is particularly busy from Easter to October. She is also responsible for the farm accounts. All the shopping and cooking for the Tea Room is done by Mrs X with some help over the preparation of food from her husband and occasional extra help. Supplies are bought once a month at the nearest supermarkets in Folkestone to which Mrs X drives in the family car. The freezer plays an important part in the planning of meals.
